name: Potwash Mayhem
description:
Install instructions

Welcome to Potwash Mayhem!

This game is based on my actual part-time job as a potwash in a restaurant that I do alongside my game studies.

I recommend playing this game with a friend as the co-operation ads to the mayhem and the fun.

This current build is just a DEMO prototype showing the basics of the basics. I hope to eventually™ add more features, mechanics and polish to this game.
